title: Remove specific Terms & Conditions FAQ entry

requirements.summary: Remove the FAQ question titled “What are the terms and conditions?” from the /faqs page so it no longer renders, without leaving empty accordion space.
acceptanceCriteria: On the /faqs page, the accordion question text “What are the terms and conditions?” is not rendered.
No empty/blank accordion item remains in the Terms & Conditions section after removal.
The remaining FAQ items and section layout continue to render without visual or runtime errors.

file_operations.description: Delete the specific AccordionItem under the “Terms & Conditions” card that renders the question text “What are the terms and conditions?” (the item currently keyed as terms-1), ensuring the surrounding Accordion structure remains valid and the remaining terms items continue to display normally. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
